item.description:
See Messages --> Cancellation Policy

Please be on time.

Once done with Sniffing Hello our four legged friends are pretty eager to get walking.
Delays usually mean tangled leashes games for their 2 legged friends .

Thank You Rita for the directions you provided the group.

DIRECTIONS The entrance to Pulpit Rock trail is on New Boston Rd.
It is approx 3.5 miles past the intersection of Wallace/New Boston rd on the left, just after Esther Rd.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the parking lot - look for my Golden Retriever Hugo & the puppy mobile: green Volvo Station Wagon with NH eprint plates. By then, I'll have a Meetup Sign in the car.
item.why: I did this trail only once, last April - lots of snow! The Pulpit Rock is just Huge. It can be discovered about 1/2 way through the trek and is most worth it!

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Soles & Paws go to Bedford, NH
